title: Teen Titans Go!:  Truth, Justice, Pizza
description: Get ready for a new teen beat! They're too young to drive, but not too young to save the world! The world's hottest heroes -- Robin, Beast Boy, Raven, Cyborg and Starfire -- are here to show you how it's done, Titan-style, in six fantastic adventures.Â Villainous video games. Dodo hunting aliens. Heroic self-esteem issues. Super dating. Monstrous zits. Super sibling squabbles. The teen superheroes from Jump City tackle it all in this exciting volume, collecting issues #1-6 of their first comic book appearances.
author: J. Torres
